amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 27, 48, 53, 56, 59, 60, 61, 62, 63, 64, 65, 66, 67, and 69 printed in House Report 114-639. See page D759 of the Congressional Record of July 7, 2016 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc and printed in House Report 114-639: Nos. 27, 48, 53, 56, 59, 60, 61, 62, 63, 64, 65, 66, 67, and 69.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crenshaw amendments Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A021) offered by Mr. Crenshaw.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crenshaw amendments Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A021) offered by Mr. Crenshaw.
